title: Build data apps in minutes, click by click.
text:
Blockr is a tool to build data apps and dashboard in minutes using a web-based point and click user interface. No coding experience is required.

Get started Try in the cloud

title: Build data apps in minutes, click by click.
text:
How does it work?
Data analyses can be broken down into fundamental units we call blocks, such as loading, transforming, or visualising data. Simply add the blocks you want to the canvas, connect them, and watch blockr automatically run the pipelines.

title: Build data apps in minutes, click by click.
text:
Share your work
Do you want to share your analysis as an interactive dashboard? Blockr ships with a clever grid-based system, allowing you to drag and drop the contents of your blocks wherever you like. Toggle parts of your block on and off to control what your users see.

title: Build data apps in minutes, click by click.
text:
Who is it for?
blockr is designed for anyone who works with data:

Analysts who want to quickly explore data without writing code
Researchers who need reproducible workflows
Teams who want to share and collaborate on data pipelines

title: Build data apps in minutes, click by click.
text:
Reproducible
Every blockr application can generate reproducible R code to recreate your analysis outside of blockr. This ensures portability and reproducibility, making it easy to switch tools, collaborate across multidisciplinary teams, and bring scientific rigor to your work.

title: Build data apps in minutes, click by click.
text:
Extensible and open-source
blockr is built on top of R and was designed with extensibility in mind. It provides a set of tools and APIâ€™s to allow developers to create their own custom blocks and extend the framework.
If you are a devloper interested in expanding blockr, get started by viewing the blockr.core R package documentation.
blockr is open-source and is released under a GPL-3 license.
